title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Comparing Cognitive Processes in Virtual and Physical Laboratories: Industry

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain experimental design, critical thinking, and ambiguity-handling processes in virtual and physical laboratories.
Learners can apply the psychological immersion experience from virtual laboratories to real-world engineering problem-solving.
Learners can analyze experimental protocols and improve their ability to identify ambiguities in experimental processes within virtual laboratory environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
